summary: This is a calendar entry for a planning/coordination meeting between the FBI and the Southern District of New York (SDNY) to discuss the arrest plan for Jeffrey Epstein. The meeting was scheduled for July 1, 2019, indicating high-level coordination just before his arrest.

events.title: Epstein Arrest Planning Meeting
events.description: A planning/coordination meeting between the SDNY and the FBI to discuss the arrest plan for Jeffrey Epstein and ensure all parties are aligned.

keyFacts: A high-priority coordination meeting between the FBI and SDNY was scheduled for July 1, 2019, to discuss the arrest plan for Jeffrey Epstein.
The meeting was created on June 28, 2019, indicating last-minute, critical planning just days before Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019.
The subject line explicitly states the meeting's purpose: 'Planning/coordination meeting with SDNY, Epstein'.
The meeting description clarifies the goal: 'SDNY would like to meet to discuss the arrest plan and ensure we're all on the same page.'
The document is a calendar entry with technical metadata (DTSTAMP, organizer, attendee fields), showing it was an official, scheduled event between law enforcement agencies.
